thread.title: #LondonAttack: First photo of suspected terrorist; NYPD brings in ‘heavy weapons’ to guard potential targets
thread.title_full: #LondonAttack: First photo of suspected terrorist; NYPD brings in ‘heavy weapons’ to guard potential targets

author: Greg P.
title: #LondonAttack: First photo of suspected terrorist; NYPD brings in ‘heavy weapons’ to guard potential targets
text:
A wider shot clearly shows multiple knives: Pictured: London terror attack suspect, surrounded by knives. Latest on Westminster rampage here: https://t.co/PAEPPyO7IY pic.twitter.com/lolYISjoUa 
— Danny Boyle (@DannyBoyle87) March 22, 2017 
In local news, the NYPD is breaking out the “heavy weapons” to defend potential targets around the city: NYPD is bringing in "heavy weapons" to Grand Central, City Hall and other locations in wake of attack near UK Parliament, CBS News reports. pic.twitter.com/HJhHLG7PKk 
— CBS News (@CBSNews) March 22, 2017 As a precaution NYPD is sending counter-terror teams to locations across the city including British UN/consular offices. 
— Chris Jansing (@ChrisJansing) March 22, 2017 
*** 
Related: #LondonAttack update: Reports of civilians 'mowed down' on Westminster Bridge; Air ambulance on scene [pics, video] https://t.co/Gq6YvVNZGv pic.twitter.com/sdjeLV6Ne3
